title: 4.4 Master Challenge 3
question: Create an interactive data-driven story using the dataset as a foundation. Develop a compelling narrative around climate change, incorporating relevant statistics, visualizations, and interactive elements. Craft a story that engages and educates the audience about the challenges, consequences, and possible solutions related to CO 2 emissions and climate change. Use the plotly library to enhance interactivity and engagement within your storytelling.
